document_data.name: Bergun Hall
document_data.mainbody: '''Bergun Hall''' was a courthouse and records hall located in the city of [[Daerlun]] in [[Sembia]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: Bergun Hall was located at the terminus of the [[Street of the Dragon]] and [[Barrel Lane]]. The building stood in the northwest corner of a large open courtyard called the "Place of Banners."{{Cite dragon/287/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: Shadowdark House|70}}
